mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( name, user_id, email, password, contact, nickname, login_type, role, image, is_verified, terms_agreed, is_active, created_at ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{contact}, #{nickname}, #{loginType}, #{role}, #{image}, #{isVerified}, #{termsAgreed}, #{isActive}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET is_verified = TRUE, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE email = #{email}
